About Me

From rockets to mobile apps, I'm passionate about making dreams & ideas become reality through problem-solving and innovative design.

Software Developer

I develop web applications with sleek, intiutive user-interfaces & exceptional performance.

Mechanical Engineer

I design solar arrays for outerspace, fuel-injected automotive systems, and robotics for agricultural harvesting.

Entrepreneur

I dream of a world with less problems and am interested in creating business around these ideas & solutions.

Experience

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur.

  • 2009 - 2013

    B.S. Mechanical Engineering, UCSB

    Studied for 4 years at UCSB and received my B.S. in Mechanical Engeering. During these years, I completed several projects in the fields of robotics, optics, micro-sensors, and aero/fluid/thermodynamics.

  • 2009 - 2013

    Network Technician, UCSB Resnet

    Built up the network infrastructure at UCSB, provided IT & Technical support for UCSB staff, faculty & students.

  • 2013 - 2014

    Mechanical Engineer II, Kollabra Consulting

    Designed, built, & tested thermal, mechanical, and robotic solutions for aerospace, automotive & agricultural industries.

  • 2014 - Present

    Software Engineering Manager, Procore Technologies

    Lead a team of Front-End Developers in design intuitive & responsive user-interfaces for a large, cloud-based web application.
